text: George Albert Davies (19 January 1897 – 1956) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Prescot Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Prescot Cables F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Merthyr Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Whiston F.C. players Category:Llandudno F.C. players Category:Caernarvon Athletic F.C. players Category:Ashton National F.C. players Category:Northwich Victoria F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: George Davies (footballer, born 1897)
